Analysis & Diagnostics

Each physician can personally review and interpret the readings on its own or can order interpretation from other available certified physicians.

Cloud System

Our cloud based system has the capabilities for patient management, data visualization, autoscoring, results presentation and repots generation.

Communicate

Reviewal and interpretation of gathered data allows certified MD to highlight important issues and provide comments on patient's health status.

It's All About

Health First

Aidmed provides fast and easy to use diagnostic technology that allows hassle-free arrhythmia and sleep apnea detection in real-time, everywhere.

Active Users (34)

Products Used (658)

Love

Your Body

Device is a sleep study and ECG recorder intended to collect and transmit the following data: ECG, chest/diappragm movements, body position and snoring sound level, plus an optional measurement of blood saturation.

Track Your

Biosignals

Pysician can easily manage recording monitors, check examination and data quality. Has also access to performed examinations and can make notes for further analysis.

48h monitoring

Health & Home

Diagnostics at home

Fast and easy setting on patient's body with direct feedback on patient's mobile device. Potential issues with patient's monitor are directly diagnosed on mobile app and patient instantly gets feedback on how to trouble-shoot.

Helping You

Get Involved In Yourself

Each patient's monitor has to be paired with mobile device equipped with internet connectivity. The app provides physicians with tools that improve patient's management and overall productivity, i.e. the app reminds patients about starting the diagnostic procedure as well as about the need to return the device. The app also monitor's data quality in real time and alarms the user about encountered issues.

Life

Specs

  • Opearing temperature: 0oC to +4o5C
  • Power supply: Internal battery Li-Po
  • Dimensions mm: 68 x 65 x 21
  • Weight: 70g
  • Sensors: 1-Lead ECG, Bio-Impedance Respiration Sensor, Skin temperature, 3-axis accelerometer, microphone, SpO2 auxiliary recorder
  • Operational time: Up to 36 hours
  • Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.0+

About us

Aidmed's mission is to provide hassle-free diagnostic solutions in order to enchance access to specialized medical healthcare disregarding of patient's location. We provide physicians with all tools necessary for fast and easy ECG and HST diagnostics and 24/7 support.
